channel.title: Help making weapons or amrour on (trisidia sourcE) post a tutorial link or help
channel.description:
i wanted to know how do you make your own weapons. i want to make my own armour and weapon someone post a tut (tutorial please) or teach me i have the program but i dont get how to use it.
please teach me :D

item.title: Help making weapons or amrour on (trisidia sourcE) post a tutorial link or help
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

Make a model, insert it into your cache and add the ints etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Help making weapons or amrour on (trisidia sourcE) post a tutorial link or help
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:472263”]I assume you’re referring to creating a Model. There are so many Tutorials on this… You’re supposed to use the Search function before posting a Thread. Make an effort yourself, and when you run into a problem, we’ll be here to help you.

This belongs in the Client Help section as well.[/quote]

Read full topic
